mapper.select: SELECT t.type_id, IFNULL(t.type_name->>'$.${lang}', t.type_name->>'$.en') as type_name ,t.type_icon FROM xjtlu_app.article_type t
mapper.sql: SELECT id, title, content, edit_time, create_time, a.editor_id, image, editor_name, avatar, type_id, #{viewerId} as viewer_id FROM ( Select user_id as editor_id, real_name as editor_name, avatar FROM xjtlu_app.user_info ) as u INNER JOIN xjtlu_app.article a ON a.editor_id = u.editor_id INNER JOIN xjtlu_app.article_type_list t ON a.id = t.article_id
mapper.select: WHERE a.editor_id = #{viewerId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
WHERE t.type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
WHERE a.title LIKE '%${keyWord}%' OR u.editor_name LIKE '%${keyWord}%' ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
